website_summaries.verdict: This sweet-smelling coffee scrub moisturizes in addition to exfoliating, thanks to a tantalizing lineup of other nurturing ingredients.
pros: Use twice-weekly, or once weekly if you have sensitive skin
Caffeine naturally combats cellulite for smoother, firmer skin
Reduces fine lines, wrinkles, dark spots and other signs of aging
In addition to coffee, this scrub also includes  butter, olive oil, almond oil, Dead Sea salt and grapeseed oil
cons: Coffee does not seem to be the main ingredient in this scrub

customer_reviews.title: This is a must for anyone with dry, flaky skin!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE I thought I'd go through this really fast, but I haven't. Small scoops work for face and the entire body (and I'm a big girl!). My skin feels great after using it. I have dry, itchy skin that flakes often and this takes care of all of it - far better than a wash cloth. It also smells wonderful. You can only use this once a week though (according to the label) so if you're looking for something for your daily regimen, you may want to pick up something in addition to this.
customer_reviews.author: The Woodruffs

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The only problem that I have is that all the oil leaks out when it's shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent!
customer_reviews.text: Reordered this product and received a completely different brand! It was awful.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer zamora

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling soft & refreshed
customer_reviews.text: This is the first body scrub that I have ever used that was dry. You put some in your hand, add a little water and rub into your skin. Has a fresh scent, not over powering. Leaves your skin soft and feeling refreshed without an oily residue. I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: TXGAL

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as it used to be!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a repeat customer for this product in the past, but it looks like they have reformulated the product in addition to new packaging. First, the smell was awful. Before, the grapefruit smell was inviting and smelled great. With the new formula and packaging, it smell nothing like grapefruit. It has an offensive smell that lingers in the bathroom. Second, as other reviewers have said, it leaves a layer of an oily feeling on my skin. The oily build up was even evident on my exfoliating gloves... so gross! The product before would exfoliate without a residue feeling left behind. Very disappointed, unfortunately, I will not be purchasing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This scrub is awesome! I get such dry skin in the winter ...
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is awesome! I get such dry skin in the winter and this scrub really helps my skin stay moisturized. I use it on my face too, it's the only scrub that won't dry out my face and helps with my acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Henze

customer_reviews.title: hands down this product is the best. I use this product once a week and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased expensive scrubs, up to $85.00...hands down this product is the best. I use this product once a week and my skin stays soft the entire time. I really can extend to once every two weeks but I love the smell of the coffee and the way my skin feels when I use it!!! Incredible product and I will repurchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the smoothness of the mixture
customer_reviews.text: I love the smoothness of the mixture. It is great for the whole body, but I particularly like it on my face. The only problem with it that will keep me from buying this again is that it makes a mess in the shower. It seems to stick to the walls, and as I have a white shower, it means I have to scrub down the walls every time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Tetzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Gave me some confidence back!!
customer_reviews.text: I spent over a week working on my new house and my skin was HORRENDOUS as result. I am 29 and have never had an issue with my skin, especially facial acne. I decided to buy this to help exfoliate my face and body (I don't normally exfoliate my face) and within a few days I noticed a huge difference. This product really helps your face feel clean. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Misty.

customer_reviews.title: More than I'm paying for
customer_reviews.text: I got it today, and I have to say that, no one of my natural homemade scrubs will compare to this one, soothing,a little goes a long way, the price can't be better and the service is also great, no regrets !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: but at this point im willing to try anything to help my skin adjust to pretty extensive weight loss over the last three months as ...
customer_reviews.text: I get really nervous with exfoliants/scrubs that have oils because it aggravates more than it helps my acne and nine times out of ten it actually makes the bottom of the tub dangerous...but at this point im willing to try anything to help my skin adjust to pretty extensive weight loss over the last three months as in 20 22w to a 14w extensive. This particular scrub i have found it works well with a african shea soap.its coffee helps to wake me up as well in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Lady byrd jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Best exfoliating scrub
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this scrub! I'm never one to write reviews but this scrub deserves it. This is not like the other scrubs on the market that tell us it exfoliates but is more like a cream or polish; this scrub is 100% Himalayan salt and exfoliates your skin leaving it sooooo soft and smelling so good! 100% will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: not an accurate description.
customer_reviews.text: What I received was rather dry, more like a plastic jar of fine black beach sand. WHAT A MESS! I returned this immediately after trying it one time. Largely because it took better than a half hour to clean up. There is no good way to contain all the grains in any area, not a sink, not an oversize shower like we have. Perhaps if the formula would change and be more like a paste, this could be interesting. Dollar Tree sells a charcoal scrub cleanser. I went back to than because iot's easy to use and clean-up is a sinch. Please "thumbs up" this review if you found it helpful. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Smooth like a baby's bottom
customer_reviews.text: This product left my skin soft, Moon, and with a very healthy glow to it maybe this verb and then for everybody but the coffee beans really does exfoliate Mexican was very soft and shiny after like a baby's bottom the only bad thing about this is the coffee grounds the other like they shouldn't go down the drain or y'all have a pile of arabica coffee grounds in your shower or tub drain like when people shave in the shower and leave the hair in the drain
customer_reviews.author: ShaKerah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Baby Smooth Skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a scrub that can both exfoliate and nourish my skin without irritating it(I have **extremely** sensitive skin!). I have been using this product for about a week now and I'm loving it! It has a refreshing grapefruit scent and it's left my skin glowing and soft - it has done a fantastic job of sloughing everything off without stripping the skin thanks to the essential oils. Definitely will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells like old dirty feet mixed with dick cheese and wet cardboard. DONT WASTE UR MONEY. When I washed this off my skin it still smelled like old feet and wet cardboard with a hint of citrus. There is no actual moisture in the scrub itself.. its like a dryish powder... but it did make my legs feel slightly smoother.. but also felt like there was some tiny scratches in my skin from the scrub. I threw this away after the 1st use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brown

customer_reviews.title: I scoop a little out and mix it with the Neutrogena Naturals face wash and it makes the perfect exfoliating scrub without being too harsh and scratching your ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second jar of this scrub and I don't think I'll ever go without it again! I scoop a little out and mix it with the Neutrogena Naturals face wash and it makes the perfect exfoliating scrub without being too harsh and scratching your skin. I have acne prone skin and this combination has cleared me up every time I had a breakout! Plus it smells amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julyssa

customer_reviews.title: Good exfoliating scrub
customer_reviews.text: Good scrub for the price..just very messy. The jar is much smaller than it appears to be on picture.
customer_reviews.author: GOLDEN GLAMOURZON

customer_reviews.title: Distinct RANCID oil smell...sadly not the same product as previous purchases
customer_reviews.text: Warning: RANCID-do NOT purchase. I just opened the sealed container this morning (it was a re-purchase...the label and brand are different but was informed it is the same as my previous purchases) and it distinctly smells of spoiled, rancid oil, even though the expiration date says September 2021. Sadly, I cannot return it because it’s been longer than 30 days...but you can avoid the hassle of smelling like a rotting baking ingredient. I loved this product in the past because it helps minimize my skin tags while leaving my skin soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Scrub I've Used
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this scrub. I purchased 4 containers because I wasn't really sure how long it would take me to go through it. It seems as if I barely even used the first one and I've been using this for a while now. A little bit goes a long way. I originally was using it everyday, and I realized that was too much because my face was becoming irritated. Not because of the product, but probably from over exfoliating. So now I do this once a week. It makes my face glow and it feels smooth and amazing. I will be ordering more as gifts for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: xoxoang

customer_reviews.title: surprizingly
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sugar scruber myself amd not likinmg salt scrub , this one really surprized me. i really like it for m,y face, b careful around eyes but has a great softener, is losses and as a face scrub love it better then clinque. It is a loose scrub and u dont need much, as i lober the taste, i dont eat it, but scrubbing dead skin offf the face sometimes one will get a taste, its good like the sugar. So i give it 5 stars as a good exfoliate
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product smells however if you're using it on your face don't do that. It stings like a beast. Smells fabulous I love the fact that it is a sea salt scrub. The one thing I dislike is you get these black balls that are really hard to scrub off the bathtub with a sink other than that was products fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffenee

customer_reviews.title: Soft Skin Again!
customer_reviews.text: My skin takes a beating! I work as A Corrections Yard Officer, so im outside 8 plus hours a day, in all the different weather. I bought this to see if it would help my skin feel "lady like". I was completely impressed after the first use. It not only removed all the dry skin, all the dead skin....it locked in mositure and my skin felt 75% better! I try to use it every other day, and after use coconut oil (from the same company) after. Seeing the improvement is amazing. I have recommended this to my other females Officers, and also my family! I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: ShaGreen

customer_reviews.title: Good! But not going to last long.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, does a great job! I did not give 5 stars, as I can tell it will not last very long! In my mind, I was expecting a larger amount.
customer_reviews.author: SuziQzie

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Don't waste your money! I got s jar of hard dried out pieces of small gravel that smelled slightly of coffee. I tried to use it,but it was so painful,I had to wash it off. Too bad I can't return it,especially since I spend $200-$300/month on beauty from Amazon. Ridiculous to be FORCED to give a 2 star review!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Engel

customer_reviews.title: There is something wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like leaving one star. This product stinks, literally. It is rancid. You know that terrible smell! I don't Even want to touch it it smells so bad! Even before I opened it I was unhappy that the labe! Was so faint it could hardly be read.except under a bright light and a microscope.
customer_reviews.author: P. Darcey

customer_reviews.title: Its okay.. not blown away just yet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural and gentle exfoliator to help even out my skin tone and prevent stretch marks. It smells great and makes my skin very soft after each use. Not sure if it’s helping to clear my skin or fade dark marks since I’ve only used it for a few weeks (maybe 3 times a week). I think you would have to give it some more time to see any results there. Not sure if I’d buy again but if you’re looking for softer skin and something sweet smelling this would be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Prisss

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness in a jar!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! This is a dry salt scrub - you could add oil to it if you wanted to but applying after warm water works really well. There is a light Tea Tree smell and the product leaves your skin very smooth and soft. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior Chick

customer_reviews.title: All purpose scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my body, face and feet. Every time I use it my skin looks and feels terrific! Skin is SO soft after each application.
customer_reviews.author: Pixiechick66

customer_reviews.title: Not the same - save your money and buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality and it used to be great. It lacks the scrubbing power and tea tree oil that it used to have. It’s basically very little salt and mostly just coconut oil or whatever they’re using. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Blz2rvr

customer_reviews.title: Really deep cleans
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter swears by this. She has used another coffee scrub but insist this is gentler on her face and clans better.
customer_reviews.author: MOONDAWG

customer_reviews.title: but it helped clear up my acne and eczema pretty much overnight
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the product once so far, but it helped clear up my acne and eczema pretty much overnight. I will definitely be adding this to my week skin care regiment.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Hailey

customer_reviews.title: I usually do not leave bad reviews but my order was dry and had to ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not leave bad reviews but I must be allergic to this product. I broke out in hives everywhere I put it on. At first I was itchy and thought to myself perhaps I'm sensitive to this product but shortly after I realized my hips, legs stomach area were all full of hives. I am sensitive but never had an allergic reaction like this. Luckily it vanished after applying tons of cool water. My advise is just be careful with the ingredients. It does make you smooth but I will never use again.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY CAPELLAN

customer_reviews.title: I’m on the fence
customer_reviews.text: The smell, unfortunately, is not even remotely coffee-like, so that was a big disappointment. Besides that though, it works as an exfoliator for sure. I would wary if you have sensitive skin since the sea salt in the product burns, but once the scrub is actually off my face my cheeks feel smooth. So that’s the major plus; it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is wonderful! It is not oily like others, or leaves a bad residue in your shower. The smell is soft and pretty. Great product and works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love no longer needing an extra step to my skincare ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for; It's gentle and yet effective at smoothing my skin and moisturizing. I love no longer needing an extra step to my skincare regimen. One minor note, I'de love the product even more if there was no "fragrance" added. It doesn't need it and there has been some concerning research published about the endocrine impact of ingredients labeled "fragrance." (Maybe an essential oil drop or two instead?)
customer_reviews.author: K K.

customer_reviews.title: My skin is so smooth!
customer_reviews.text: A friend had recommended this to me because we had both been talking about a scrub we used to use years ago. Neither one of us could find one we liked since, until this. I absolutely love it! I have yet to use it on my face, even though it is labelled for it, but my skin breaks out easily. However, my skin has never been so soft and smooth. I also have rough skin on my knees from kneeling at work a lot ( i'm a vet tech and much of my job is on the floor some days) and they couldn't be smoother! I definitely recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  great price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is Fabulous! Everything they said it would do, it did. My whole body advantaged from it. You have to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: vortiz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Leaves face nice and smooth after use. Definitely can see a difference in my skin. It is a little messy, but what else do you expect for charcoal.. I suggest using in the shower to help with the mess clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Calypso

customer_reviews.title: It's good but very oily
customer_reviews.text: I love that the ingredients are natural nothing bad in it. It does leave my skin very soft. But feels like an oil slick on your face/body even after you rinse it off. So probably not good for people with oily skin type. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: B cuda

customer_reviews.title: Good but messy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this except once you put it on your hands, it gets wet and waters down to not much and I always have to use more. It's also reallllly messy. Other scrubs I've used are definitely not as messy. I also assumed the container was much larger than in reality.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Elise

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the scrub I've been looking for! I have very sensitive skin, but this product is just the right amount of exfoliant for my face and neck. It wakes my skin up as well as taking off any dead skin. It also leaves a slightly waxy residue after application, which I was worried might make me break out, but it actually just softened my skin and made it extra smooth. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kate broderick

customer_reviews.title: Way too scented
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is very perfumed and bright pink. I prefer natural ingredients that are gentle, and this feels a little bit harsh to use on my whole body. Good for spots like feet and elbows, but not for delicate skin.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: This product seems to work immediately (disclosure: I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work immediately (disclosure: I have been using on face and body for over a week, but noticed a difference after first use). I am 52 and am constantly looking for ways to add natural moisture to my aging skin. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: La_Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Dried out with awful rancid smell
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times in the past, but it was not available for a while. When it came back it had new packaging, but it did not say that the formula had changed. When I opened it it was all dried out, not moist like it used to be. And even though it had two years until the expiration date the little oil that was left made the product smell rancid. No pleasant grapefruit smell like it used to have. Of course the return window was closed... I will never order this product again. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G. Ahamad

customer_reviews.title: Very dry product
customer_reviews.text: There’s not enough coconut oil or liquid to apply it to your skin, it just flakes right off. I have been adding it to my face soap a small scoop at a time to use it up. I would not buy this again because of that although it might be good for someone with really oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Smells Strange
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how this scrub smelled (I thought it smelled like seaweed) but my husband loved the scrub and has now used all of it. I'm glad it was able to be put to good use. I thoroughly enjoy scrubs but will not be re-ordering this particular one due to the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for softening skin anywhere on your body & great price
customer_reviews.text: Love the scrub, makes my hands & face so soft & keeps the moisture for more than 24 hours. Great price. Need a spoon or small scoop to get the ground coffee out — do not use fingers (according to the directions). It’s also a big mess if u use fingers
customer_reviews.author: ECMark

customer_reviews.title: Won’t get this one again
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well. Extremely rough and dry with no softening properties. The ones I’ve had I. The past have a nice oil in them to make your skin feel softer.
customer_reviews.author: DeGaetano

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scrub. Smells good and is not overpowering. Leaves my skin feeling nice and soft. I would purchase it again. Doesn’t feel overly abrasive
customer_reviews.author: Desiree B.

customer_reviews.title: Freaking love this scrub
customer_reviews.text: Freaking love this scrub.Seriously. I use it about every other day and I couldn't be happier. It helped clear up some of my acne but was never harsh. AND THE SMELL! I love the scent of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scrub! I have been wanting to try something with charcoal in it and am glad I found this. My skin feels soft and smooth and I am noticing some marks on my face starting to fade. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because it is messy and leaves black residue on your skin which can be a little difficult to wash off. But it’s not impossible to get off. Other than that, I love this scrub and how it makes my skin feel and look!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn M

customer_reviews.title: Oily Body Scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is oily when put on skin I actually had to use body wash to remove the layer of oil left on my skin which was thick also left the shower floor slippery...be careful.... overall not what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: JBunny

customer_reviews.title: Ending up throwing it away
customer_reviews.text: I ended up throwing this away. My skin was so dry afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Herndon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great salt scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is a great salt scrub. Wish it was mixed with oil though. That would make it easy to shave with. This is a great texture of salt. Not too fine, not too course. Great on chiggers, poison Ivy, or bug bites. I think it'd be good mixed with another product (in your hand) before applying. I've used it with a another salt product that barely had any salt in it. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: I felt like this was too dry and too coarse
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this was too dry and too coarse. Trying to dig it out of the jar was a pain, and then it's falling all over the place and more ended up down the drain than where I was putting it. Then, it's so coarse, I wonder about the advisability of letting it go down a drain. For me, not a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Open and dried out! :(
customer_reviews.text: I just received by jar of Arabica coffee scrub. Unfortunately, I wasn't ever able to try it. The lid was open and the inner wrap was torn off. It was like receiving a jar of sand. It had no smell no nothing. Just dark dry dirt. I was and still am so bummed. I really wanted to try it. I think it should be replaced for free as it is on its way back to where is came from. Renee
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: SO smooth
customer_reviews.text: this coffee scrub made my skin feel so incredibly soft and smooth!! the coffee smell was extremely intense, so if you really hate the smell of coffee you may not be able to stand this, but i loved it. the scrub did feel like it left a bit of an oily residue on my skin (since i rinsed off in the shower, i could feel it) but once i got out of the shower and dried off, the oily feeling went away and my arms and legs were just soft instead. 10/10 would recommend, especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: rors29

customer_reviews.title: I lived this it has a wonderful scent and left my feet so soft and nicely ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product only for my feet. It is hard to sometimes take time and go get pedicures. I brought products to do at home as I wear a lot of sandals. I lived this it has a wonderful scent and left my feet so soft and nicely exfoliated and moisturized. I also use on my body and I recommend highly!! Very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Melissa De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Smells Weird
customer_reviews.text: This does not smell like grapefruit to me at all. The texture is okay, but not as nice as some other brands I've tried. The smell is off-putting to me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Baby soft skin.
customer_reviews.text: I adore this stuff. There is a subtle leftover smell, it’s not amazing, but it’s 100% tolerable since my skin was softer than a baby’s bum. Seriously, first time I did not have to lather in lotion after a shower!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi J

customer_reviews.title: Hi there. I purchased this scrub few days ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi there. I purchased this scrub few days ago and I have just tried it. Is it only me or this scrub doesn't smell coffee AT ALL! On contrary, it has some very weird smell of fried French toast or bagels :-( I don't think I will be using it!!! Milan
customer_reviews.author: Milan Popovic

customer_reviews.title: Crumbles too much.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this body scrub. It crumbles too much in the shower and makes a pretty good mess. The smell wasn't quite what I expected, but it wouldn't bother me if it wasn't such a hassle to use.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne TravelerTec

customer_reviews.title: THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to promote products, but if you get an opportunity to try this, it is the most amazing scrub I've ever used. Smells fabulous, and your skin feels smooth and soft... Minimizes pores, too. 5 ★★★★★ product!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn N

customer_reviews.title: Citrus Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Only okay. Not great for value. Not great for skin. Pretty scratchy. Pretty good sting everytime. Nothing special. Nothing fun or exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I use it on my face daily and it makes my face feel so smooth and gets rid of everything. I use this and then neutrogena moisturizer and that makes my makeup foundation apply so beautifully and even. This is an amazing product and works magic!
customer_reviews.author: Jen01234

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it !!!! Used it yesterday makes your skin feel really soft and smooth not greasy and I like the aroma will def buy again or purchase as a gift 😊Thank you also for fast shipping !!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia  J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. The smell and consistency are great. Leaves your skin smooth and smelling amazing
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Very great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome face scrub ! Face felt so smooth and radiant looking after first use. Has no strong or harsh odor. Not a cream it is in granule and just dump some in your hand from jar and rub into skin . Rinses off easy and does not irritate the skin.
customer_reviews.author: crystal jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Best exfoliater ever!
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a natural exfoliating cream that I can use on my face and body. To my surprise it was more of a salt scrub than a cream. I thought I would give it a try, and I LOVE IT! My skin felt so soft and smooth after and it was gentle enough for my face which is a bit sensitive. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: LeAndra K

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: used this product a few times and to date am very satisfied with results. Personally I mix the product (after removing from container) with a little water or jojoba oil before applying to face. This procedure insures that more of the mixture stays on my face.
customer_reviews.author: clay floyd

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Its a scrub so I made the mistake of rubbing really hard at first. No need to rub to hard. Its smells great on my skin left it feeling clean and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna S Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I order this, and my husband loves it too. Leaves your hands soft and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Good for face
customer_reviews.text: While I like the scent and the way it makes my face feel soft after use, it's not as great in the shower on my skin. It takes a fair amount to work into that much skin and I would need to be buying it at least every month, if not sooner. So while I won't buy it again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Pknv

customer_reviews.title: Nice BODY scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this scrub before I shave, it makes my skin feel so soft and smooth. I decided to try it on my face but it immediately started to burn so I just washed it off right away. My face was very dry and flaky for several days after that. I would not recommend using it on your face, it’s too harsh. But as a body scrub, it works great! If you don’t mind a little mess which isn’t difficult to wash away in the shower, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn M

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. Not worth the price....also, it would fall apart when scooped up. A lot wasted in shower. Not like other scrubs I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love love this stuff. It smells amazing and I think it is a great addition to a relaxing night. I don't like the consistency though. I feel like it's to dry for my taste but that could just be me.
customer_reviews.author: redguard

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels softer and smoother
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good and makes my skin feel so soft and smooth. Doesn't overdry my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah S.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The scent is good but not too powerful It has a good scrub, not too rough, nor too gentle This isn't oily either, which I prefer
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: This is not a natural product when fragrance, etc is added
customer_reviews.text: Deceptive advertising! Wish I could return this unopened item. There is fragrance added and it is "Made in China". I will not use or recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DLightful Living Young

customer_reviews.title: Must try to appreciate
customer_reviews.text: Great exfoliation and if u like the smell of coffee you will like the smell of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: My husband agreed too harsh for your face maybe only good for body exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: OUCH! I do not have sensitive skin but I could not even use this product on my face, it is very coarse and grainy and burns your skin immediately! My husband agreed too harsh for your face maybe only good for body exfoliating.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Absolute useless JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely coarse, undeniably dry and gross. Can't stand the scent though i am a crazy coffee lover! No matter how hard you try, you will end up wasting a lot of the product as it can't stick together or any surface of your skin to be worked on. No way you can use it on your face unless you want your healthy cells to burn down to death. Now you know where the $6 goes, TRASH!
customer_reviews.author: PKS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for scrubbing the legs
customer_reviews.text: This makes your legs silky smooth by scrubbing the dead skin cells off
customer_reviews.author: melzTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the fragrance and the oils. Also a great exfoliator. I gave it 4 stars because I assumed it was a sugar scrub, not salt. My fault, sea salt was clearly listed as an ingredient. Salt just dries me out too much. I am NOT sending it back. I will enjoy it. But I will be more careful in the future.
customer_reviews.author: L Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Super scrub
customer_reviews.text: The jar is small but it doesn’t take much! I normally use scrubs on dry skin or they dissolve too quickly but this one works well on wet!
customer_reviews.author: Jkn

customer_reviews.title: My new organic favorite
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just because it was a lightning deal and I try to use organic products. Didn't even use it for ages because I liked what I was using just fine. Then I used it on my face and wow. I love it. My new facial favorite.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schmoll

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Read that it was messy due to the charcoal getting everywhere, and does. But it's worth it, at least for my skin, it exfoliates like a charm, without drying.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin really soft, I don't even need to use lotion afterward
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I would be happier if it was more like a paste. When I put this on my face, some of it just falls right off rather than sticking to my skin. Other than that, it smells awesome and leaves my skin feeling really soft. It went a lot faster than I would like (it lasted 3 months) because my roommates kept stealing it! I guess they like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: But I really do love these natural scrubs
customer_reviews.text: Used a lot of coffee scrubs, I will say however the smell of coffee isn't as strong in this one which doesn't bother me one way or the other. But I really do love these natural scrubs. I feel moisturized after using it but it is best to use with one of those exfoliating gloves as well! For sure am repurchasing after I have used up all of this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rylee

customer_reviews.title: Dried out.
customer_reviews.text: I need high moisture and exfoliation. This is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Using straight sea salt on your face. Smells like salt, feels like salt, and makes your face greasy. Waste of money. I won’t be using after only using it once.
customer_reviews.author: N. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin feel so smooth
customer_reviews.text: Works well. When I use it in the shower the smell kind of reminds me of freshly baked maple bars. I love how soft and smooth it leaves my skin feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I visited Amelia Island and the hotel had bowls of this stuff in the ladies room and sold it in their spa. It wasn't cheap. This product is just as good if not better than the products at a Ritz Carlton.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult and takes time to work with!
customer_reviews.text: Product's grainy like consistency has nothing keeping it together. You loose a lot applying it to your body.
customer_reviews.author: SKS

customer_reviews.title: It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: Product is OK. Very fine granuals and requires a lot of product to spread thru body. Scrub a bit dry. It did exfoliate, but I had to use half container first use to get results. :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful scrub. The salt scrubs away the dead skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful scrub. The salt scrubs away the dead skin, while the coconut oil leaves skin soft and moisturized. I use it not only on my face, but anywhere that my skin is dry and in need of some TLC.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is FANTASTIC!! I love the smell and the incredible ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is FANTASTIC!! I love the smell and the incredible softness of my skin afterward. My husband has even used it a couple of times on his hands and knees and loved the results. All natural and it does what it says it will do...I'm hooked.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer neargardner

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product at all!
customer_reviews.text: No value for money! I would never purchase this product again. The product description seems misleading. Huge Scrub crystals do not stick to the skin. Very oily.
customer_reviews.author: akira

customer_reviews.title: Dry salt
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother. She couldn't apply it herself. The salt scrub was way to dry. It didn't hold together to scrub with. She hated the mess it made by dropping all over.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Exfoliating Arabica Coffee Body Scrub - Best Skin Exfoliator for Face Hand Lip & Body with Sea Salt & Shea Butter, Acne & Eczema Treatment, Exfoliate Moisturize, Stretch Mark Scar & Cellulite Remover
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Piece| Color:Coffee Scrub

WHAT PREMIUM NATURE’S ARABICA COFFEE SCRUB CAN BE USED FOR:

- Fine Lines, Wrinkles and Skin Imperfections
- Cellulite and Firms Skin
- Moisturizing and Smoothing Skin
- Brightening Complexion

PREMIUM NATURE NATURAL ARABICA COFFEE SCRUB IS THE ULTIMATE ANTIOXIDANT & EXFOLIATION SCRUB

AtPremium Naturewe strive to create and make the best products for our customers. We continue this tradition with our all Natural Arabica Coffee Scrub. This scrub is unlike any other because it is full of antioxidants which greatly benefit your skin. All of the ingredients for this product promote healthy skin:Shea Butter, Olive oil, Almond Oil, Dead Sea Salt and Grapeseed Oil.The Arabica Coffee Scrub contains coffee grounds that work as an exfoliant toremove all that dead skin to reveal your new glowing, healthy skin.

THE ULTIMATE ANTI-AGING BEAUTY PRODUCT

Our Arabic Coffee Scrub has many great features that promote the health and beauty of your skin.The coffee grounds can moisturize your skin along with the dead sea salt and organic coconut ingredients. Caffeine also battles Cellulite as it tightens your skin which results in you having firmer skin.

Our Scrub is also safe to use on your face as well! You can use it on the skin around and underneath your eyes in order to reduce the appearance of puffy eyes. How? Because caffeine has the ability to naturally restrict the blood vessels which are responsible for causing swelling and inflammation. We guarantee that you will love our product
feature_bullets: CELLUITE DESTROYER: Our Arabica Coffee Scrub has Caffeine which is a natural agent against Celluite. Our exfoliating body scrub battles it away to leave you will smoother, firmer skin!

ANTIOXIDANT EXFOLIATION: Our exfoliating scrub features many antioxidants which work as a natural exfoliant to reveal only your best, healthiest, smoothest skin! It will fight strech marks & cellulitis.

ANTI-AGING: This body scrub exfoliator can be used wrinkles, fine lines and dark spots to leave you with beautiful skin to be seen. It can be used as a face scrub, lip scrub, body exfoliator, hand scrub, foot scrub, acne scar treatment and more!

AMAZING ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS: This body exfoliating Scrub features the amazing ingreidents of organic Shea Butter, Olive oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Dead Sea Salt and Grape seed Oil, Rose Hip Oil & organic cocoa butter.

SWEET SMELL: Not only does this salt scrub leave your skin feeling soft and looking younger, it also has a very sweet aroma. You will look good and smell good after using this product . Everyone loves coffee, that's why our scrubs can be use dby both: women & men. For even better results, you can use our products with exfoliating gloves.
